item.title: 日本 9 月出口同比下降 1.7
item.description: 日本财务省周四公布的数据显示，日本 9 月份出口同比下降 1.7%，为 10 个月来首次下降。【原文：Japanese exports dropped 1.7% year-on-year in September, marking the first decrease in 10 months, data from the Ministry of Finance showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 智库称英国小型企业需要帮助以结束 "厄运循环
item.description: 一家智库周四表示，在更广泛的免税和激励措施的帮助下，英国规模较小的上市公司可以扭转因估值骤降、成本上升和监管加强而导致的 "厄运循环"。【原文：Britain's smaller listed companies can reverse a "doom loop", driven by plummeting valuations and higher costs and regulation, with help from broader tax exemptions and incentives, a think tank said on Thursday.】

item.title: 官员称通用汽车和富士康将以墨西哥进口替代本地生产
item.description: 墨西哥经济部副部长周三表示，美国汽车制造商通用汽车公司和台湾科技巨头富士康将于本月晚些时候宣布计划，将进口到墨西哥的产品换成在墨西哥生产的产品。【原文：U.S. automaker General Motors and Taiwanese tech giant Foxconn will announce plans to swap out imports to Mexico for production in the country later this month, the nation's deputy economy minister said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 高盛预计美联储未来将连续降息 25 个基点
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）周三表示，预计美国联邦储备委员会将在 2024 年 11 月至 2025 年 6 月期间连续降息 25 个基点，最终利率区间为 3.25-3.5%。【原文：Goldman Sachs said on Wednesday it expects the U.S. Federal Reserve to deliver consecutive 25-basis-point (bps) interest rate cuts from November 2024 through June 2025 to a terminal rate range of 3.25-3.5%.】

item.title: 工业涂料需求疲软，PPG 季度利润不及预期
item.description: 受工业涂料部门销售额下降的影响，油漆和涂料生产商PPG工业公司周三公布的第三季度利润未能达到华尔街预期。【原文：Paints and coatings maker PPG Industries missed Wall Street estimates for third-quarter profit on Wednesday, hurt by lower sales at its industrial coatings unit.】

item.title: Robinhood 推出桌面平台，在应用程序中增加期货和指数期权交易功能
item.description: Robinhood 周三推出了期待已久的桌面平台，并在其移动应用程序中增加了期货和指数期权交易功能，这家金融科技公司的目标是从传统经纪商手中抢夺市场份额。【原文：Robinhood launched its long-awaited desktop platform and added futures and index options trading features to its mobile app on Wednesday, as the fintech firm aims to take market share from traditional brokerages.】

item.title: 经济停滞不前，欧洲央行将连续第二次降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行可能在周四再次降低利率，认为欧元区的通货膨胀现在越来越受到控制，经济正在停滞不前。【原文：The European Central Bank is likely to lower interest rates again on Thursday, arguing inflation in the euro zone is now increasingly under control and the economy is stagnating.】

item.title: 受人工智能热潮推动，台积电将公布强劲盈利报告
item.description: 台湾中芯国际集成电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co , the dominant producer of advanced chips used in artificial intelligence applications, is expected to report a 42% leap in third-quarter profit on Thursday thanks to soaring demand.】

item.title: 抵押贷款市场不景气，Equifax 2024 年收入低于预期
item.description: 信用评级公司 Equifax 周三表示，预计全年营收将低于华尔街预期，原因是利率持续走高拖累了贷款需求，并使抵押贷款市场停滞不前。【原文：Credit ratings firm Equifax said on Wednesday it expects full-year revenue below Wall Street estimates, as higher-for-longer interest rates continued to weigh on loan demand and kept the mortgage market stagnant, sending shares down 5% after the bell.】

item.title: 亚洲 通胀降温，台积电提供人工智能风向标
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 克利夫兰联储警告租金涨幅过高可能对整体通胀构成压力
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行周三在一份报告中称，房租通胀将在未来一段时间内继续给消费者带来压力，这一结论可能表明，美联储在使整体通胀率回到2%的水平方面仍面临挑战。【原文：Rent inflation will continue to put pressure on consumers for some time to come, the Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland said in a report on Wednesday, in a finding that may point to ongoing challenges for the Fed to get overall inflation back to 2%.】

item.title: 必和必拓第一季度铁矿石产量增长 3%，超出预期
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group）周四公布第一季度铁矿石产量增长3%，原因是该全球矿业巨头得益于其在西澳大利亚业务中为缓解瓶颈所做的努力。【原文：BHP Group posted a 3% rise in first-quarter iron ore output on Thursday as the global mining giant benefited from efforts to ease bottlenecks at its Western Australia operations.】

item.title: 电动汽车需求低迷，Lucid 预计第三季度亏损幅度将超过预期
item.description: 由于成本高企和需求低迷，电动汽车制造商Lucid集团预计第三季度亏损幅度将超过预期，导致其股价在周三的盘后交易中下跌10%。【原文：Electric vehicle maker Lucid Group expects a wider-than-expected third-quarter loss amid high costs and sluggish demand, sending its shares down 10% in aftermarket trading on Wednesday.】

item.title: 利息收入强劲，拨备减少，Discover Financial 季度利润大增
item.description: 发现金融公司（Discover Financial）周三表示，由于美国信用卡发行商的净利息收入攀升，潜在不良贷款拨备下降，该公司第三季度利润猛增 43%。【原文：Discover Financial's third-quarter profit jumped 43% as the U.S. credit card issuer's net interest income climbed and its provisions for potential sour loans fell, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 大疆公司称美国海关停止从中国制造商大疆进口部分无人机
item.description: 中国无人机制造商大疆创新周三告诉路透社，美国政府正在阻止部分大疆无人机进入美国。【原文：The U.S. government is stopping imports of some DJI drones from entering the United States, the Chinese drone maker told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 煤炭运量低迷，铁路公司 CSX 盈利不及预期
item.description: 美国铁路运营商 CSX 周三公布的第三季度利润低于华尔街预期，原因是煤炭运量减少抵消了价格上涨带来的收益，导致其股价在盘后交易中下跌 3.4%。【原文：U.S. railroad operator CSX reported third-quarter profit below Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, as lower coal volumes offset benefits from stronger pricing, sending its shares down 3.4% in after the bell trade.】

item.title: 价格和原油产量疲软，康德摩根公司季度利润不及预期
item.description: 受大宗商品价格疲软和原油产量减少的影响，美国输油管运营商金德摩根公司（Kinder Morgan）周三公布的第三季度利润低于华尔街预期。【原文：U.S. pipeline operator Kinder Morgan fell short of Wall Street estimates for third-quarter profit on Wednesday, weighed down by weaker commodity prices and lower crude volumes.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，美国全国广播公司环球公司将在孔雀频道上播放当地体育节目
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三援引熟悉该计划的人士的话报道，康卡斯特旗下的 NBC 环球公司计划最快于 2025 年初在其孔雀流媒体服务中加入地区体育频道。【原文：Comcast-owned NBCUniversal plans to add its regional sports channels to its Peacock streaming service as soon as early 2025, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the plans.】

item.title: 黑莓探索 Cylance 业务的各种选择
item.description: 黑莓（BlackBerry）对下一财年利润的预测高于市场预期，并表示正在探索其 Cylance 业务的各种选择，这使得这家加拿大公司的股价在周三上涨了 4% 以上。【原文：BlackBerry forecast profit for its next fiscal year above market estimates and said it was exploring options for its Cylance business, sending shares of the Canadian company more than 4% higher on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，麦肯锡接近与司法部就阿片类药物调查达成 5 亿美元的和解协议
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三报道，咨询巨头麦肯锡公司（McKinsey & Co.【原文：Consulting giant McKinsey & Co. is close to reaching a deal with U.S. prosecutors to pay at least $500 million to settle federal probes into its past work helping opioid makers boost sales, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国暂定每天新增五班华盛顿航班
item.description: 消息人士告诉路透社，美国交通部计划在周三晚些时候宣布，暂定将从华盛顿里根国家机场向各大航空公司提供五个新的每日往返航班。【原文：The U.S. Transportation Department plans to announce later on Wednesday it is tentatively awarding five new daily round trip flights from Washington Reagan National airport to major airlines, sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 消息人士称，裕信银行因欧洲央行对俄罗斯的要求而陷入法庭困境
item.description: 熟悉情况的人士告诉路透社，裕信银行在提出异议数月后，仍在等待法院裁决是否必须立即削减俄罗斯业务以遵守欧洲中央银行的命令。【原文：UniCredit is still awaiting a court decision over whether it must immediately reduce its Russia business to comply with a European Central Bank order, months after filing an objection, people familiar with the situation told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国联邦存款保险公司任命新的职业操守办公室主任
item.description: 美国联邦存款保险公司周三表示，其董事会已批准任命 Hansel Cordeiro 为新成立的专业行为办公室主任。【原文：The Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation said on Wednesday its Board of Directors has approved the appointment of Hansel Cordeiro as director of a new Office of Professional Conduct.】

item.title: 空中客车公司称正在评估裁员的财务影响
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus）周三对分析师表示，在评估新宣布的国防与航天部门 2500 个裁员岗位的财务影响时，公司将暂不计提费用。【原文：Airbus is holding off taking a charge for 2,500 newly announced job cuts in its Defence and Space unit as it assesses their financial impact, the company told analysts on Wednesday.】

item.title: 白宫表示，斯特兰蒂斯应兑现对 UAW 的承诺
item.description: 白宫周三表示，斯特兰蒂斯应兑现对美国汽车工人联合会（United Auto Workers union）和受美国工厂关闭影响的社区做出的承诺。【原文：The White House on Wednesday said Stellantis should deliver on commitments made to the United Auto Workers union and communities affected by plant closures in the United States.】

item.title: 波音公司通过股票和混合债券完成 150 亿美元融资
item.description: 四位熟知内情的消息人士告诉路透社，波音公司正在接近制定一项计划，通过普通股和强制可转换债券筹集约 150 亿美元的资金，以改善这家喷气机制造商因瘫痪性罢工而恶化的财务状况。【原文：Boeing is closing in on a plan to raise around $15 billion with common shares and a mandatory convertible bond as the jet maker bolsters finances worsened by a crippling strike, four sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 第三季度报告强劲，电信巨头 America Movil 股价攀升
item.description: 墨西哥电信巨头 America Movil 公布了强劲的第三季度业绩，该公司股价在周三早盘交易中大涨 2%。【原文：Shares in Mexican telecommunications giant America Movil jumped 2% in Wednesday morning trading after the company reported strong results in the third quarter.】

item.title: 花旗银行从富国银行聘请戴维斯担任北美地区增长股权主管
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份备忘录，花旗集团已从富国银行聘请了股票资本市场银行家 Cully Davis 担任其北美成长型股票部门的主管。【原文：Citigroup has hired equity capital markets banker Cully Davis from Wells Fargo as the head of its growth equity unit in North America, according to a memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: PIMCO 称英国预算不太可能震撼市场，金边债券看起来很有吸引力
item.description: 全球资产管理公司 PIMCO 的高级管理人员表示，英国新政府在本月的首份预算案中不太可能令投资者感到不安，其债务前景也比金融市场似乎认为的更为乐观。【原文：Britain's new government is unlikely to upset investors in its first budget this month and the outlook for its debt is more positive than financial markets appear to believe, senior executives from global asset manager PIMCO said.】

item.title: 消息称阿联酋航空订购更多波音 777F 货机
item.description: 业内人士称，世界上最大的货运航空公司之一--迪拜阿联酋航空正在扩充其波音 777F 货机机队，以应对货运量的急剧增长。【原文：Dubai's Emirates, one of the world's largest cargo carriers, is expanding its fleet of Boeing 777F freighters as it plans for sharp growth in cargo traffic, industry sources said.】
